answers.author: Robert Carty
answers.text:
Audience response technology is nice as it can get good feedback, provide a starting point to delve deeper into data, and avoid a few people taking control of a meeting. Also, post-meeting, you have electronic data that doesn't need to be copied from flip-charts or transcribed another way.
I've seen these as stand-alone, or integrated with PowerPoint with audience members getting little remote controls. You can also correlate your slide questions to citizen survey questions if you prepare enough in advance.

author: Brittany Mollica
text: What are the most effective methods of presenting information about the budget and the budget process (like a Budget 101 presentation) to employees/citizens so that the presentation is more interactive?   Outcomes would include employees and citizens that are well-informed and have the ability to respond and give feedback and suggestions regarding the budget and budget process.
title: Interactive Budget 101 Presentation
